title: i start the client
body: ive been having trouble starting the client for a few days now and riot still hasnt emailed me back yet and im starting to get pissed off. ive acualy been thinking of going over to dota 2. atleast that might work

replies.body: I'd like to help with this, but could use some more information to find out what's happening.  Are you receiving any error messages?  Is it happening at a specific % in your patcher?  Would you be able to share a screenshot of what you're seeing?  Any additional detail would really help out!  Looking forward to hearing back.

Dota... more like Dont Da 
(Say it aloud)

Greetings,

Could you provide us with some more details as to what happens when you attempt to start the client?
Do you receive a bug splat / error message? 
Does the patcher just close?
